Looking for help with my t206 McGraw Portrait w/ Cap back run.

American Beauty 460
EPDG
Sovereign 460
Uzit

Jimi
Down to 5 more.  Any helpers out there?  :)
have you seen an American Beauty 460 of this card?

Just picked up the last SC version and now down to some toughies.  Only one known Uzit, I believe, and I have never seen the AB before.  I missed out on the EPDG last month and the Sovereign is not too common either.  Ugh!  What have I gotten myself into!
